alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Local Area Emergency issued January 07 at 9:33PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF BEAVER COUNTY EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT. EIGHTY-THREE YEAR OLD JACK FISHER MORRISON, A WHITE MALE, HEIGHT FIVE FEET ELEVEN INCHES, WEIGHT ONE HUNDRED FIFTY POUNDS, BROWN EYES, GRAY RECEDING HAIR, HAS BEEN MISSING SINCE 5 PM CST SUNDAY JANUARY 7 2024. HE WAS LAST SEEN IN BEAVER DRIVING HIS BURGUNDY 2000 DODGE DAKOTA EXTENDED CAB PICKUP, OKLAHOMA LICENSE PLATE H A B 2 6 1. JACK IS ON OXYGEN BUT HIS SUPPLY IS LOW. JACK IS ALSO DIABETIC AND HAS MISSED HIS EVENING INJECTION. ADDITIONALLY, JACK HAS DEMENTIA AND MAY NOT KNOW WHERE HE IS. IF YOU LOCATE JACK, PLEASE CONTACT THE BEAVER COUNTY SHERRIF`S DEPARTMENT AT 5 8 0 6 2 5 4 5 4 9.
